web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: AlertDialogContent now has ARIA accessibility attributes (role='alertdialog', aria-modal='true', aria-labelledby, aria-describedby). Uses AlertDialogContext with useId() to generate unique IDs shared via useAlertDialogContext() hook for AlertDialogTitle and AlertDialogDescription components.

web/src/components/tailadmin/ui/modal/in.description: Custom Modal component has Escape key handling and body scroll lock, but lacks role="dialog", aria-modal="true", and focus trapping. TypeScript component that needs JSX hook integration.

web/src/hooks/useFocusTrap.ts.description: New useFocusTrap hook implements focus trapping for modal components. Accepts containerRef and isActive boolean. Exports FOCUSABLE_SELECTOR constant. Stores previously focused element, traps Tab/Shift+Tab, and returns focus on cleanup.
